
//

new entry "AI_FACTION_OVERRIDE"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StackId" "AI_FACTION_OVERRIDE"
data "Icon" "TAC_FactionOverride"
data "Boosts" "FactionOverride(Source);Advantage(SourceDialogue, Charisma)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "ApplyToDead;DisableCombatlog;DisableOverhead;DisablePortraitIndicator"

new entry "AI_HELPER_PIXIESHIELD"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
using "SCL_MOONSHIELD"
data "StackId" "SCL_SAFE2"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "ApplyToDead;DisableCombatlog;DisableOverhead;DisablePortraitIndicator;ExcludeFromPortraitRendering"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnCombatEnded;OnTurn"
data "RemoveConditions" "not Combat() and not Dead()"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('GLO_PIXIESHIELD')):ApplyStatus(GLO_PIXIESHIELD, -1, 1)"
